choices.name: choice_sla_5x9_NBD_PO_override
choices.choiceText: Override Contractual SLA to [5x9 NBD PO]

decisions.description: This decision was added as a workaround solution for the uncovered bug in the Custom Lookup that is used in Screen 1 for the Asset selection (A user can bypass the lookup validation by repeatedly clicking on the next button for few times)
decisions.name: Asset_Selection
decisions.label: Asset Selection

decisions.name: Was_a_Case_created_by_the_Customer
decisions.label: Was a Case created by the Customer?

rules.name: Case_was_created_by_Experience_Cloud_User
rules.label: Case was created by Experience Cloud User

rules.name: Template_Required
rules.conditionLogic: (((1 OR 2) AND 3 AND 10) OR (4 AND 5 AND 6) OR (7 AND( 8 OR 9)))
rules.label: Template Required

Flow.description: Changes for NFN issue and tech issue

formulas.description: done for EBA_SF- 2622 to map the province field
formulas.name: Address_province
frm_sla_id_mapping
formulas.expression: CASE({!new_work_order.Service_Level_Name__c} , '5x9 NBD PO', '1', '5x9 NBD PT', '2', '7x9 NCD PO', '3', '7x9 NCD PT', '4', '7x24x4 PO', '5', '7x24x4 PT', '6', 'S-TECH', '11', '5x9 NBD PO FSL', '17', 'C-TECH', '22', '15 Day Repair & Return', '500011', '5x9 NBD PT FSL', '500012', '7x9 NCD PT FSL', '500013', '7x9 NCD PO FSL', '500014', '-1')

formulas.name: frm_sla_response_mapping
formulas.expression: CASE({!new_work_order.Service_Level_Name__c} , '5x9 NBD PO', 'NBD', '5x9 NBD PT', 'NBD', '7x9 NCD PO', 'NCD', '7x9 NCD PT', 'NCD', '7x24x4 PO', '4SD', '7x24x4 PT', '4SD', 'S-TECH', 'NBD', '5x9 NBD PO FSL', 'NBD', 'C-TECH', 'NBD', '15 Day Repair & Return', 'RRR', '5x9 NBD PT FSL', 'NBD', '7x9 NCD PT FSL', 'NCD', '7x9 NCD PO FSL', 'NCD', 'New for New', 'NBD', 'RMA-STD')

fields.name: dt_error_missing_site_account
fields.fieldText: Sorry, we can't proceed with your request as a site must be selected to create a dispatch work order.

fields.name: dt_missing_solution_sets_0
fields.fieldText: A Hardware Role has not been defined for this product within the solution set {!Get_Asset_Record.Site_Id__r.cdm_Solution_Set_ID__c} assigned to this site. Please contact the customer support team for assistance.

fields.name: dt_missing_failure_reasons_0
fields.fieldText: A Failure Reason has not been defined for this product within the support class {!Get_Asset_Record.RAD_Support_Class__c} assigned to this asset. Please contact the customer support team for assistance.

fields.name: dt_override_sn
fields.fieldText: You can select the serial number from existing serialized assets related to the same site account, or you can simply choose to manually insert the value.

fields.name: dt_qualify_nfn
fields.fieldText: Request qualifies for New for New replacement. Select from below to proceed.

fields.name: dt_oos
fields.fieldText: Request is marked as Out-of-Scope. Select from below to proceed.

fields.name: dt_existing_wo_error
fields.fieldText:
Sorry, there's an open request in the system. We cannot proceed with a new Hardware Request.


Existing Request(s):

{!existing_work_orders_numbers}

fields.name: it_config_details
fields.helpText: The config details field supports up to 50 characters.

validationRule.errorMessage: The value must be less than or equal to 50 characters

fields.name: dt_email_template
fields.fieldText: Please fill out the following email template details:

fields.name: it_template_scope_of_work
fields.helpText: What the on-site technician needs to do before leaving the customer's location

fields.name: it_template_scope_of_work_EC
fields.helpText: What the on-site technician needs to do before leaving the customer's location

fields.name: dt_summary
fields.fieldText:
Please review the following details. Next, a work order record will be created and an outbound request will be sent out to ES.

The result of the outbound request will be shown on the next screen.

fields.name: dt_error
fields.fieldText:
An error occurred while trying to send the dispatch request. Please provide your system administrator with the following error details:


WorkOrder Id: {!ES_Outbound_Request.workOrderId}

Error:

{!ES_Outbound_Request.errorMessage}

fields.name: dt_success
fields.fieldText: The dispatch outbound request has been sent successfully. Please click Finish to view the work order record.
